name: Get Fixed Car Loan Calculation with invalid Loan Repayment Frequency

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

When I request a repayment calculation for a loan with values
| loanType | amount | term | repayment | repayment Frequency |
| Car_Fixed | 12000 | 36 | 123213 | weekly |
Then I should receive a Validation Error

title: Get Fixed Car Loan Calculation with invalid Loan Repayment Frequency
